General.Name: Riverfort Global Opportunities PLC
General.Description: RiverFort Global Opportunities plc is a private equity and venture capital firm specializing in equity, convertible debt, mezzanine debt, senior debt and royalty instruments investing across the growth stage of public and private small cap growth companies. It prefers to invest in technology, natural resources, energy (including power generation and transmission), financial and healthcare sectors. It seeks to invest in companies based in the United Kingdom. The firm typically invests between US$3 million and US$10 million in its portfolio companies. RiverFort Global Opportunities plc was incorporated in 1932 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 18 High Street, High Wycombe, United Kingdom, HP11 2BE
